item.description:
Hello NHRC Members!

Tomorrows weather is supposed to be PERFECT for climbing outdoors. Don't believe me? Check it out weather for climbers dot com

The plan is to meet at CT Rock Gym in New Haven 9am and climb until approx 4pm at Ragged Mountain in Southington. This IS a CRG sanctioned climbing trip for all ability levels and rental equipment is included. Basic belay skills are recommended. Carpools may be available.

RSVP through Meetup and SAVE $10 on the trip. Regular price is $35 CRG members or $50 otherwise. A steal compared to other guide services charging well over $100 a day.

If you have any questions...please call the gym 203.404.5166 or email Nate@ctrockgym.com

Likely the last great weather weekend this season, we hope you'll come out!
item.name: Outdoor Climbing Saturday (Meetup Discount)
